article_text:
Avon Products Inc. plans to reduce its headcount by an additional 600 positions, largely in its corporate staff and North America business, part of the beauty-products company's continuing turnaround efforts.

The move is part of a broader $400 million multiyear restructuring program. Avon on Monday said it expects to realize annual pretax cost savings of $240 million to $250 million related to restructuring actions approved to date...
